attributes.action: Leave The EU like the British people voted for. 17.5 million voted LEAVE.
attributes.additional_details:
The British government should support the UK population and leave the EU with our without a deal.
While i agree MP'S have there own mind set they should support the will of the people.
Say NO to a second referendum Say No to Revoking article 50
Either support the Deal or leave with no deal!
Stop blaming MAY as its not here fault you wont support her deal NOR is it her fault that the EU have clearly stated this is the only deal and it will not change!
We ask you to do the will of the people.
attributes.background: 17.5 million people voted to leave.. We did not vote to leave and then maybe change our mind. The creation of a second referendum would cause chaos as you can not just change you mind when you don't like a choice.
